Scripts.OnClick: EncounterJournal_SetClassFilter(self:GetID(), self.name); self:GetParent():Hide();
EncounterJournal_SelectSearch(self:GetID())
EncounterJournal_SelectSearch(self:GetID())
EncounterJournal_DisplayCreature(self);
if IsModifiedClick("CHATLINK") and ChatEdit_GetActiveWindow() then if self.link then ChatEdit_InsertLink(self.link); end return; end EncounterJournal_DisplayEncounter(self.encounterID)
HandleModifiedItemClick(self.link);
EncounterJournal_ShowFullSearch()
self:GetParent():Hide();
EncounterJournal_SetClassFilter();--Clear self:GetParent():Hide();
